title: Elevator/s, High Speed Internet Access, Resident Lounge
posting_body: ['Glendale Park is a 13-story seniors only building catering to those 55-years of age and over and who have low to very low income.', ' Glendale offers two different one-bedroom floor plans and offers monthly activities, great views of Memphis, relaxing balconies and professional management.', '  Come take a tour today and see for yourself why our seniors love us!', '-Automatic Payment Options Available', '-Common Areas Monitored by 24-Hour Video Surveillance', '-Walk-In Closets', '-Planned Monthly Activities', '-Generous Resident Referral Program', '-Patios/Balconies', '-Resident Lounge', '-Elevator/s', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Full-Size Appliances', '-Disability Access', '-High Speed Internet Access', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
